content: I think I'm ready to take my game to the next level! Thanks for the tips on preparing for my first lesson. I'll make sure to communicate with my coach, be open-minded, and focus on the process. I'm looking forward to improving my backhand slice and overall game. And, of course, I'll keep in mind that I've been playing in a weekly doubles league on Thursdays with my friend Alex, so I'll be sure to apply what I learn to our matches.
